item.title: What happen with your Kafka cluster when Zookeeper is gone? (not related with KIP-500)
item.description: This post will try to answer this question: If you have a running environment with a Kafka cluster and Zookeper ensemble, what would happen if we lose all the Zookeeper nodes and start with a clean ensemble? Although this question is not related with KIP-500, it might become irrelevant once this KIP is adopted. Scenarios I can imagine 2 scenarios: The Zookeeper ensemble is lost while Kafka cluster running.
